dial011:
I'm a test NPC and this is a test dialogue.
(Press "space bar" to proceed)
dial013:
Watch out! The level is about to begin!
(Press the key "Z" to jump)
dial011gf: Hurray! You won, and you are now reading the end dialogue.
dial011dv:
You already passed this level. Are you sure you want to redo it?
You can press escape to abort.
dial02_11:
This level is a bit longer than the previous one.
Watch out for holes!
dial02_11gf: Good job, you finished the second level!
dial02_11bf: What a pity, but you can train on the first level if this one is too hard...
dial02_11dv: Do you want to try again?
dial02_21gf:
You passed the second level.
For real this time!
dial02_21bf:
What a shame, you lost...
And what's worst is that you also have to repeat the first part!
dial02_22bf: The creators of this game are really sadistic...
dial02_21dv: And without any surprise, the second part....
dial03A1gf: You picked up the key, well done!
dial03A1bf1: You died. Fortunately, it's not too important in this game.
dial03A1bf2: You have reached the end of the level, but to move on to the next one, you have to get the key of this one!
dial03A1dv:
You've already got the key of this level.
But you can always do it again if you want!
dial04A2: It seems that not all the dialogues have been added....
dial04A2gf: It seems that not all the dialogues have been added...
dial04A3gf: They even copy-pasted my own dialogue!
dial04A2bf: This one is not even translated!
dial04A2dv: What a bunch of lazy people... I'm sure they left names of objects with underscore thinking nobody will see it...
dial03B1: Good luck for this level, brave adventurer!
dial03B1gf: Glad to see you made it out alive.
dial03B1dv: Your next line is : "Good luck for this level, brave adventurer!" !
dial03B2dv: Good luck for this level, brave adv... What ? But, but... How ?
dial04B1: This is the last level of this path.
dial04B1dv:
This is still the last level of this path....
No, really, there's nothing hidden.
dial04B1gf: Congratulations! Completes the other path too to complete this map.
dial04B1bf: Hang in there, you're almost done!
dial041f: Congratulations! You finished the map, so you finished the game for now.
dial1A01b: ??? : Hey ! What are you doing here ?
dial1A02b: ??? : Don't stay there or they will see you !
dial1A04b: ??? : Here it's better ... but we don't have much time
dial1A06b: Skeletons : HERE THEY ARE GET THEM !!!
dial1A02a: Lothair Darkwalker : I'm Lothair Darkwalker by the way a priest from Madriia, south from here. And you you are you and what were you doing there ?
dial1A04a: Winton : I'm an adventurer seeking for the ebony ring of the sleepless, a mythic artefact kept by and ancient god.
dial1A05a: Winton : An alchemist told me I may find it their but he hasn't spoken about skeletons
dial1A06a: Lothair Darkwalker : This region is well known for skeletons, their kingdoms rises in the depths of Midden Pass
dial1A07a: Lothair Darkwalker : Be carefull this regions is known to be a very dangerous for adventurers.
dial1A08a: Lothair Darkwalker : I would advice you to be carefull with who you talk to.
dial1A09a: Lothair Darkwalker : This alchemist may have tried to kill you by sending you here
dial1A10a: Lothair Darkwalker : Wait ... What is that ?
dial1A11a: Lothair Darkwalker : Your alchemist may be right in the end !
dial1A12a:
STONE :இரவு ஒரு முறை வெளிச்சமாக இருந்தபோது,
 மற்றும் நனவான ஒரு விமானம்,
 தூக்கமில்லாதவர் நோய் வந்தார்,
 அவர் இருந்த உலகம்,
dial1A13a:
அவர் போராடும் உணர்வு,
 இரவு இருட்டாக இருப்பதால்,
 இனி பேழை,
 ஆனால் ஒரு குகையில் அவர் விளைவிக்கிறார்,
dial1A14a:
அவரை யாரும் கண்டுபிடிக்க முடியாத இடத்தில்,
 தூக்கமில்லாதவர் தூங்குகிறார்.
dial1A16a: Lothair Darkwalker : I have no idea but it seams like elvish
dial1A17a: Lothair Darkwalker : We may find elves in the Haelgard forest south from here
dial1A18a: Lothair Darkwalker : They may help us to understand what it means
dial1A02abad: Winton : It wasn't supposed to end this way !
dial1B01b: Lothair Darkwalker : The domain of elves should be right there.
dial1B02b: ??? : (voice in the air) Who are you strangers and what bring you in the Haelgard Forest ?.
dial1B03b: Lothair Darkwalker : We are adventurers who comes from Midden Pass where we've found something that might interest the Queen.
dial1B04b: ??? : Fair enough but I need to warn you : strangers are not welcome here. You'll need to pass a test first. If you succeed I'll introduce you to the queen.
dial1B06b: ??? : The forest will guide you. Find it's heart and you will pass the test
dial1B07b: ??? : May you feel the heart of the forest and be the leaf which falls when it's silent
dial1B01a: ??? : Congratulations you are worthy to see the queen.
dialB01abad: ??? : You are not ready. Retry when you are ready to trust the forest instead of your head
help_yourmusicfolder: Put your .ogg files in the data/your music/ folder to generate the appropriate level. .mp3 and .wav files might also be loaded, but no warranty is given.
erase_savefile: Do you want to restore default options and ERASE YOUR SAVEFILE ??
